review_blob: golden, clear, sparkling, frothy, white foam, light sweetness, medium bitterness, lightly sour, medium body, thin feel, lively, long finish.  Beer must refresh me.  This beer refreshes.

amber, clear, minimal head, light sweetness, medium bitterness, lightly sour, medium body, thin feel, average carbonation, astringent. Lots of people want me to drink something that resembles Bitrex -- VB on steroids.  That aint beer.  Nastro Azzurro refreshes me, leaving me with wanting more just for the pleasure.  Thats beer.
